perturbation.original_text: WHEREAS, the Distributor wishes to retain S2K, through registered representatives of S2K ("Authorized S2K Representatives"), to introduce the Funds to registered representatives of broker-dealers and registered investment advisers located at the financial institutions (each, an "Intermediary" and collectively, "Intermediaries") that may have customers interested in investing in a Fund.
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS, the Distributor wishes to retain S2K, through registered representatives of S2K ("Authorized S2K Representatives"), to introduce the Funds to registered representatives of broker-dealers and registered investment advisers located at the financial institutions (each, a "Financial Partner" and collectively, "Intermediaries") that may have customers interested in investing in a Fund.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Intermediary' is now being used to describe 'Financial Partner'. This creates confusion because 'Intermediaries' is also defined as a collective term. It is unclear if 'Financial Partner' is a subset of 'Intermediaries' or an equivalent term, leading to potential misinterpretations of the contract's obligations.

perturbation.original_text: S2K agrees, subject to the provisions of this Agreement, through its Authorized S2K Representatives, to use its reasonable best efforts to market the Funds to the Intermediaries, and to identify, refer and/or introduce Intermediaries to the Funds. In connection therewith, S2K may (i) engage in seminars, conferences and media interviews for financial intermediaries; (ii) distribute sales literature and other communications (including electronic media) regarding the Funds, subject to review and approval of such material by the Distributor; and (iii) perform other services reasonably contemplated in writing by S2K and the Distributor.
perturbation.changed_text: S2K agrees, subject to the provisions of this Agreement, through its Authorized S2K Representatives, to use its reasonable best efforts to market the Funds to the Intermediaries, and to identify, refer and/or introduce Potential Clients to the Funds. In connection therewith, S2K may (i) engage in seminars, conferences and media interviews for financial intermediaries; (ii) distribute sales literature and other communications (including electronic media) regarding the Funds, subject to review and approval of such material by the Distributor; and (iii) perform other services reasonably contemplated in writing by S2K and the Distributor.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase 'Intermediaries' is now alternated with 'Potential Clients.' It's not specified if 'Potential Clients' are the same as 'Intermediaries,' or if they are the end customer of the 'Intermediaries' that S2K is meant to target.

perturbation.original_text: 5. Compensation; Expenses (a) As described in the Fund's Prospectus, the Fund may impose a sales charge "load" in connection with the purchase of shares of the Fund, a portion of which will be paid to S2K pursuant to the terms and conditions of the Prospectus. (b) In consideration of the marketing, sales and other related activities provided by S2K, the Distributor may compensate S2K for such services on each Fund's behalf and at the direction of each such Fund. The amount of compensation payable by the Distributor to S2K hereunder shall be determined on a class by class basis. At the direction of each Fund, ALPS or its designated agent will facilitate the payment of the applicable dealer reallowance fee to S2K in the amounts set forth in Exhibit B hereto. S2K shall perform such distribution-related activities for which such payments are appropriate under all applicable rules and regulations and shall make such occasional certification as required by the Distributor to such effect.
perturbation.changed_text: 5. Remuneration; Expenses (a) As described in the Fund's Prospectus, the Fund may impose a sales charge "load" in connection with the purchase of shares of the Fund, a portion of which will be paid to S2K pursuant to the terms and conditions of the Prospectus. (b) In consideration of the marketing, sales and other related activities provided by S2K, the Distributor may compensate S2K for such services on each Fund's behalf and at the direction of each such Fund. The amount of Remuneration payable by the Distributor to S2K hereunder shall be determined on a class by class basis. At the direction of each Fund, ALPS or its designated agent will facilitate the payment of the applicable dealer reallowance fee to S2K in the amounts set forth in Exhibit B hereto. S2K shall perform such distribution-related activities for which such payments are appropriate under all applicable rules and regulations and shall make such occasional certification as required by the Distributor to such effect.
perturbation.explanation: The word 'Compensation' has been replaced with 'Remuneration' at random in this section. Without explicitly defining what 'Remuneration' means in this context, there is an opening to interpreting it different from 'Compensation.'
